## VisualPluginOptions interface

Base options for every visual plugin (component)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VisualPluginOptions<TCssClasses = any> extends PluginOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cssClasses](./grid.visualpluginoptions.cssclasses.md) | <code>TCssClasses</code> | Css classes applied to visual plugin (component), possible to override only part of classes |
